snippet: Pointing to the Supreme Court’s landmark rulings, advocates for same-sex marriage will argue that the state must  immediately permit them.
abstract: Advocates for same-sex marriage in New Jersey are set to appear in trial court to argue that United States Supreme Court's landmark rulings on such marriages require state to immediately permit them; case is first nationwide to test the effect of the Supreme Court's landmark same-sex marriage rulings on state laws.
lead_paragraph: Pointing to the Supreme Court’s landmark rulings, advocates for same-sex marriage will argue that the state must  immediately permit them.

headline.main: New Jersey Court to Hear Same-Sex Marriage Case
headline.print_headline: New Jersey Court to Hear Same-Sex Marriage Case

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
